mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spring.delivery_detail (ord_det_id, waybill_num, mem_id, dlvy_sts, pack_type, rg_num, md_num) VALUES (#{ord_det_id},#{waybill_num},#{mem_id},#{dlvy_sts},#{pack_type},#{rg_num},#{md_num})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM spring.delivery_detail ORDER BY rg_date DESC, ord_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE spring.delivery_detail SET dlvy_cmplt_date = current_timestamp, dlvy_sts = #{dlvy_sts}, md_num = #{md_num}, md_date = current_timestamp WHERE ord_det_id = #{ord_det_id}
